subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt opened his season with a 150-meter win on a track set up at Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro. Bolt cruised to victory in 14.42 second.
snippet: Usain Bolt opened his season with a 150-meter win on a track set up at Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro. Bolt cruised to victory in 14.42 second.
